name: Mark Weakley
biography:
B.F.A., 1967, The University of Texas at Austin
B. S., Instructional Media Technology, 1974, The University of Texas Health Science Center at Dallas.
M. A., Biomedical Communications, 1975, The University of Texas Health Science Center at Dallas.
1975-1979  Medical Illustrator, University of Texas, various locations.
1979--Commercial Illustrator, self-employed.
Source: Personal Comunication from Mark Weakley.
